text: Nan namakar aghuiba, kɨ faragha ingangarir God ua bar e inizir kamɨn, akɨnafarim osirigha ia mɨkɨmasa bar ifonge. Egha kɨ datɨrɨghɨn kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, kɨ akɨnafarir igharazim osiram. Ia uan nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba bagh bar gavgafigh. Egh ia Godɨn akar aghuimɨn apanibar akaba batogh. E Godɨn gumazamiziba, a nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn arazir vamɨram e ganɨngi. Eghtɨ gumazamiziba en nɨghnɨzir gavgavim batueghɨva, akar igiatam arɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ.
